thread.title_full: Video: 2015 Alfa Romeo 4C Spider & 2016 Mazda CX-3 | Watch MotorWeek Online | PBS Video

author: pbs.org
title: 2015 Alfa Romeo 4C Spider & 2016 Mazda CX-3 MotorWeek
text: In this episode, we blow our top in the Alfa Romeo 4C Spider. Pat Goss helps us find the perfect balance for power-trains. Zach Maskell goes over the edge in style on a grand touring trek across Scotland. Then we'll continue the small crossover overload with the Mazda CX-3.
